author: Johnny Harris
description:
How the American immigration police got so powerful.
Get 40% off Ground News’ unlimited access Vantage Plan at https://ground.news/johnnyharris for only $5/month, explore how stories are framed worldwide and across the political spectrum. 

Join the Newpress waitlist here: https://newpress.com/

Check out all my sources for this video here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/12Sc-hyXFhV8N_YmtkTgroGRwBVKLTdt5teQEbBPKC8o/edit?usp=sharing

ICE, a government agency created after the 9/11 attacks, seems to have free rein under the Trump administration. How did we get here? How did ICE become so important, and so powerful?

Special thanks to:
- Daniel
- Hiroshi Motomura, UCLA School of Law
- Kathleen Bush-Joseph, Migration Policy Institute
- Heidi Altman, National Immigrant Justice Center
- Aaron Reichlin-Melnick, American Immigration Council
- Shannon Shepherd, Immigration Attorneys, LLP 
- Jennifer Van Hook, Pennsylvania State University

title: ICE’s real plans for America
